summary: This bill, the National Landslide Preparedness Act Reauthorization Act of 2025, reauthorizes and amends the National Landslide Preparedness Act. Key changes include updating definitions related to atmospheric rivers and extreme precipitation events, expanding the scope of the national landslide hazards reduction program to include these events, incorporating Native Hawaiian organizations, Tribal organizations, and institutions of higher education, establishing regional partnerships, and modifying grant programs and funding. The bill also amends provisions related to the 3D elevation program.
